thread.title: PHOTOS: Every Costa Rica sloth image you will ever need to see
thread.title_full: PHOTOS: Every Costa Rica sloth image you will ever need to see -The Tico Times

author: Lindsay Fendt
title: PHOTOS: Every Costa Rica sloth image you will ever need to see
text:
There was a time, not so long ago, when sloths were not considered adorable. That time has now passed and here at The Tico Times we want to make sure our readers get their fix of super cute sloth photos. Here are all the best photos we could scrounge up from our staff as well as a few favorites from the web. Thank us later.
Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times
Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times
The Tico Times
Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times
Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times

Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times
Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times
itchy
A video posted by Matt Stopera (@djmattystopes) on May 23, 2014 at 6:07pm PDT
Somebody looks very relaxed just chillin with his mom! #slothlove
A photo posted by Sam Trull (@primatography) on Sep 11, 2015 at 12:02pm PDT
Lindsay Fendt/The Tico Times
Did you know The Tico Times has its own sloth mascot? Yup, and you can get him on a T-shirt. Check out our online store .
Contact Lindsay Fendt at lfendt@ticotimes.net
